message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of significant value to your business. While I can't disclose specifics at this time, I can tell you that it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,250,000.  This is a substantial deal, and I believe it will be a mutually beneficial partnership. Let me know your thoughts.
